name: Jayanthi Sivaswamy
content: Jayanthi Sivaswamy - IIIT Hyderabad CONTACT Menu Jayanthi Sivaswamy Professor Emeritus Ph.D (Syracuse University) Email: jsivaswamy[at]iiit.ac.in Publications Institute Webpage Personal homepage Research areas Image processing, medical image analysis and biological vision Research Centers/Labs Signal Processing and Communication Research Center (SPCRC) does active research at theoretical and applied levels. https://spcrc.iiit.ac.in/ Center for Visual Information Technology (CVIT) focuses on basic and advanced research in image processing, computer vision, computer graphics and machine learning. http://cvit.iiit.ac.in/ Awards & Achievements Was appointed a Member of the Research Advisory Council of Sree Chitra Tirunal Institute of Medical Sciences and Technology in 2016.
